body:
Yep, especially when you didn't think you stayed outside long enough to get one -_-
Oh well :P
Now I have a white X on my back.....

Share your sunburn stories here if you wish.

replies.body:
I was on a cruise, earlier this year (it was going too New Caledonia)
It got extremely hot, and I didn't put sunscreen on....

I turned into a red raw tomato. It was the worst cruise experience.

replies.body: Went to Cuba (in real life I am pale white) so when I arrived in Cuba the first full day I got so burnt I could bearly sleep since I could feel the heat IN my arms, got better 4 days later, I had to wear long sleeve shirts or else my arms would get more heat in it and it would be burning and I would have to blow my arms every 10 seconds
